Single-Site, Exploratory, Cross-Sectional

Source: R/pf_output_subfuncs.R
pf_ss_exp_cs.Rd

Single-Site, Exploratory, Cross-Sectional

Usage

pf_ss_exp_cs(data_tbl, output, facet)

Arguments

data_tbl

output from pf_process function

output

desired output - have 2 options:

  • median_site_with0s: specific site median, including patients with no evidence of patient fact (e.g., if domain = labs, includes in the median all patients with and without any labs)

  • median_site_without0s: specific site median, not including patients without evidence of patient fact (e.g., if domain = labs, only includes median for patients with evidence of a lab)

facet

variables to facet (e.g., domain); vector of strings

Value

a bar graph displaying the median facts per follow-up for each domain and visit_type

On this page
